zappos.title: Hoka Clifton 10 Men's
description: A trusted trainer for daily maintenance miles, the Hoka One One® Clifton 10 has been the keystone of our cushioned styles for 10 years and counting. Ushering in a new era of plush performance, this next-generation update delivers a revitalized underfoot experience with an additional 3mm in heel-to-toe drop. Delivering the same ultralight cushioning that made the Clifton a fan favorite, we've fine-tuned the fit and added a breathable jacquard upper with the double-lace lock to mitigate tongue migration.
Textile lining and EVA insole.
Lace-up closure.

zappos.title: Teva Original Universal Women's
description: The primary materials that compose this product contain a minimum of 20 percent recycled content.

The Teva® Original Universal sandals combines the best parts of a shoe and sandal with its secure fit, supportive comfort, and reliably grippy outsole that allows everyone to enjoy the outdoors in a whole new way.

Vegan-friendly sandals feature quick-drying straps that are made from 100% recycled plastic using traceable REPREVE® polyester yarn by Unifi®. These summer sandals are created using synthetic and plant-based material and save 4 plastic bottles from ending up in landfills.
Universal Strapping System™ and earth-friendly recycled polyester webbing supports your foot and offers long-lasting durability.
Cushioned EVA footbed provides all-day supportive comfort.
Durable rubber outsole provides reliable traction.
Product measurements were taken using size 9, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.

amazon.title: Nike Womens Nike Pegasus 41 Gore-tex Wasserdichter Straßenlaufschuh Für Damen

zappos.title: Nike Pegasus 41 Women's
description: The Nike® Pegasus 41 is where future-ready style meets feel-good performance. Featuring upgraded breathable engineered mesh, this pair keeps things light, airy, and fast. Inspired by the iconic Air Max 90, the elongated design lines add a modern twist to a heritage classic. The all-new ReactX foam midsole- more responsive than before-teams up with dual forefoot and heel Air Zoom units for a ride that's springy and smooth. A full-length Nike Air unit plus Cushlon 3.0 foam amps up plush comfort, while the waffle-inspired rubber outsole delivers dependable traction and flexibility. With a spacious forefoot, wider heel, elasticized midfoot band, and plush collar, tongue, and sockliner, every step feels locked in yet free to move. Crafted with purpose, ReactX reduces its carbon footprint, supporting both performance and planet.
Product measurements were taken using size 8, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.

zappos.title: Brooks Ghost 17 Women's
description: The Brooks® Ghost 17 shoes offer balanced cushioning for smooth transition, support, and reliability in the long run. Their premium nitrogen-infused DNA Loft V3 provides a balanced ride and plush underfoot comfort. Crafted for ultimate comfort and peak performance, the new double jacquard air mesh upper keeps your feet cool and comfortable. They are designed with an EVA insole and nylon lining. These lace-up shoes are a perfect choice for your outdoor rides and adventures.
Round toe silhouette.
Rubber outsole.

PDAC A5500 Approved: Pricing, Data Analysis and Coding A5500 Diabetic Medicare Coding is awarded to footwear that is available in three or more widths, with a removable insole (sock-liner). These attributes may allow a footwear style to be deemed an extra-depth shoe. It also allows individuals to pay for their footwear through their Medicare. PDAC must be applied for on a yearly basis and is not automatically available to styles that meet its criteria. For more specific info, visit the Medicare website or call 1-800-MEDICARE.
